ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Results Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.14)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="30954-2" Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-389, CONF:735)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data" (CONF-391, CONF:736)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:854, CONF:855, CONF:856), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.59)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:2011, CONF:2012, CONF:2013), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.58)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:2014, CONF:2015, CONF:2016), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Imaging Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.5)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF-388, CONF:737)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.59)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.58)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Imaging Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.5)
